original_text: And a basket of unleavened bread, cakes of fine flour mingled with oil, and wafers of unleavened bread anointed with oil, and their meat offering, and their drink offerings.
korean_text: 무교병 한 광주리와 고운 가루에 기름 섞은 과자들과 기름 바른 무교전병들과 그 소제물과 전제물을 드릴 것이요

sentences.original_text: And a basket of unleavened bread
cakes of fine flour mingled with oil
sentences.korean_translation: 기름과 섞인 고운 가루로 만든 과자

sentences.original_text: and wafers of unleavened bread anointed with oil
